column4: Hi. In Ubuntu 11.04 the Radeon 6470m (NI Seymour) was unsupported. How can I find out if it is now supported in Ubuntu 11.10?
Well, it's basically the driver supporting it, not the distribution itself. I would suggest finding out what version of the driver is being installed with "Hardware Drivers managerS2
aurondance: it was the default from "Additional Drivers". I'm assuming the latest on (11.9?)
